title: VVonderfull straunge sightes seene in the element, ouer the citie of London and other places on Munday being the seconde day of September: beginning betweene eight and nine of the clocke at night, increasing and continuing till after midnight: most strange and fearefull to the beholders.
author: Day, Thomas, fl. 1583.
publisher: Printed by Robert VValde-graue, dwelling without Temple-barre, neere vnto Sommerset-house,
